message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little to $9,000. This is a very fair price for a product of this quality. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay $8,750. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hi Bob, you seem to recognize the value of this product. It's clear it would be a great asset to you.  Let's split the difference - $8,875 and we have a deal.
